attributes.action: Remove OR Increase the 45MPH speed limit for new drivers on NI roads - NOW.
attributes.additional_details: When merging onto a motorway/dual carriageway, where cars are moving at 70-80MPH, it can be quite daunting as a new driver and very dangerous for other road users. Please sign the petition to make the road a safer place.
attributes.background: In Northern Ireland, new drivers must display ‘R plates’ on their cars. This tells to other road users that they’re a new driver and that they are restricted by Northern Irish laws, to a maximum speed of 45MPH except on slow roads. This is dangerous on roads such as the motorway. Help change this.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:
